programme.desc: Karoot Komedia X S4 adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan oleh pelawak terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak Series Ep04
programme.desc: Tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.Saksilan lakonan mantap Lisa Surihani , dan kumpulan senario

programme.title: Projek Komedi Warna Ep04
programme.desc: Rancangan realiti yang mencari pelawak-pelawak berkaliber yang digabungkan dengan pendekatan transmedia di mana peminat dapat berinteraksi dengan pelawak kegemaran mereka.

programme.title: Bas Stop! Ep01
programme.desc: Selebriti dan pelawak mengalami situasi sebenar kehidupan seharian seperti pemandu teksi, pembaiki kasut, penyanyi jalanan dan pelbagai lagi dalam mengetengahkan isu-isu yang dihadapi dari sudut komikal.

programme.title: JOZAN Ep04
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2016 Ep06
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2016 menampilkan 15 peserta solo dan kumpulan berentap merebut gelaran juara dan hadiah RM 500,000!

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok Ep05
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.title: Temasya Sukan Kelaut Ep05
programme.desc: Program sukan yang diselitkan elemen komedi, menampilkan pelawak tanah air serta selebriti sukan terkenal. Sukan sebenar diubah jadi satu bentuk sukan yang menghiburkan.

programme.title: Kuali Terbalik Ep05
programme.desc: Sebuah program baru yang menggabungkan elemen drama, komedi dan program masakan dalam satu rancangan. Setiap episod akan menampilakan spoof daripada drama terbaik Astro dan juga filem box office.

programme.title: Padan Muka! Ep05
programme.desc: Pelawak & selebriti popular perlu menjawab soalan sambil diganggu untuk alih perhatian mereka daripada memberi jawapan betul. Jika gagal, mereka didenda dan reaksi diberi adalah paling ditunggu-tunggu.

programme.title: Chapalrela Ep05
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Anjang Merah yang sering dibuli oleh saudara dan mak tirinya lakonan mantap Zizan, Johan dan Sherry Ibrahim.

programme.title: Selera Rasa Seksa Ep05
programme.desc: Saksikan Datuk Chef Wan dalam sebuah 'game show' masakan komedi yang riuh! Pedas! Panas! Bersama selebriti terkenal tanah air.

programme.title: Di Balik Tawa Ep05
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara menggunakan konsep terbuka atau sesi perkongsian daripada pelawak-pelawak yang akan menceritakan pengalaman dan kisah yang mereka tidak pernah kongsi dengan masyarakat.

programme.title: Kisah Tok Kadi S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Humairah menyangka yang mungkin beliau hamil. Namun sebelum hal ini diberitahu kepada Shahrul, ia telah tersebar menerusi media sosial.

programme.title: ChiaChiaChia Sepahtu Reunion Live 2021 Ep07
programme.desc: Saksikan Jep, Rahim & Pak Ya dalam musim terbaru Sepahtu Reunion Live bersama selebriti undangan setiap hari Khamis, jam 9.00 malam hanya di Astro Warna saluran 107.

programme.title: Layan Je! Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep08
programme.desc: Jangan lupa saksikan secara langsung Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 setiap Jumaat, jam 9.00 malam di Astro Warna & strim di Astro GO!

programme.title: Layan Je! Annyeonghaseyo Cikgu Maryam Ep05
programme.desc: Jangan lupa saksikan sketsa lucu dan menghiburkan dalam Annyeonghaseyo Cikgu Maryam hanya di Astro Warna & On Demand.

programme.title: Layan Je! Arena Panggang Ep01
programme.desc: Bersama pelawak popular, siapakah yang paling handal 'membahan' antara satu sama lain? Saksikan semuanya dalam Arena Panggang, mulai 28 September setiap Jumaat, 10 malam.

programme.title: Gema Lawak Superstar Ep02
programme.desc: Bertemakan 'Spoof-Sama Tak Serupa', kumpulan manakah yang bakal dinobatkan sebagai juara mingguan pada minggu kedua ini?

programme.title: Arena Panggang: Marah Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Pernahkah anda melihat pasangan selebriti suami isteri berperang mulut? Ianya berlaku dalam Arena Panggang Marah-Marah Sayang kali ini. Jangan lepaskan peluang untuk saksikan adegan 'panas' suami isteri.

programme.title: Super Spontan Xtravaganza 2018 Ep05
programme.desc: Bertemakan 'tukang masak', kumpulan manakah di antara Sotong Kangkung atau Lobster Leleh yang bakal mara hingga ke peringkat ahkir.

programme.title: Countdown Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep07
programme.desc: Debaran kian terasa! Jom ikuti apakah persiapan para peserta menjelang siaran langsung Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 pada Jumaat, jam 9.00 malam di Astro Warna.

programme.title: The Masked Singer Malaysia Ep01
programme.desc: Program paling popular di dunia kini di Malaysia! Bersama hos Dato' AC Mizal dan barisan juri popular, saksikan peserta mana yang bakal menanggalkan topeng mereka?

programme.title: (L) Countdown Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep08
programme.desc: Debaran kian terasa! Jom ikuti apakah persiapan para peserta menjelang siaran langsung Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 pada Jumaat, jam 9.00 malam di Astro Warna.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2021 Ep07
programme.desc: Jep, Rahim, dan Pak Ya kini kembali menghiburkan anda dalam musim terbaru Sepahtu Reunion Live! Lebih kelakar, lebih 'pick-up line'! Saksikan siapakah tetamu jemputan & kejutan yang bakal bersama Sepahtu?

programme.title: (L) Maharaja Lawak Mega 2021 Ep04
programme.desc: Pada minggu ini, para peserta diberi cabaran untuk melakukan persembahan bersama selebriti undangan bertemakan seram! Kumpulan mana yang bakal mendapat 5 HA & siapa pula selebriti jemputan mereka?

programme.title: Meja Panggang Ep02
programme.desc: Bersama Dato Rosyam Nor, Didie Alias, Sharifah Shahira & Achey, saksikan mereka 'memanggang' para tetamu dengan soalan-soalan panas tentang kisah lampau dan peribadi mereka.

programme.title: Warung Sepahtu Ep08

programme.title: Wu Ming Wei Shi Ep32
programme.desc: This broad selection of drama series genres includes romance, military and family connections, captured in China's great classics.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: 5 Shaolin rebels train hard in order to successfully defeat their Manchu enemies. Starring David Chiang, Ti Lung, Alexander Fu.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: Hsu Hsia, a great kung fu actor himself, both directs and leads a team of four martial arts choreographers in his hilarious tale of 'kung fu pickpockets.'

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: A sword-master turned umbrella-maker goes up against a zombie-maker with a 'finger of doom' in this critically acclaimed film.

programme.title: That Man in Chang-an
programme.desc: Yan Jun stars in this romantic Han dynasty adventure epic as a dying emperor alongside an evil queen, amidst plots and counterplots galore!

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: This Yuan Dynasty tale tells of the Sacred Fire sect, Wu Tang clan, O Mei's disciples, a sacred book, and the destruction of Shaolin.

programme.title: Angel With the Iron Fists
programme.desc: After her father is killed by gangsters, a young woman seeks revenge plus bids to ensure that justice is served. Starring Lily Ho.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: An ace swordsman fights evil, rescues women and takes part in duels to the death.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: To achieve his goal, a man who craves supreme power stops at nothing, including murdering the Emperor and using his own daughter as a pawn.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A jewel thief tries to have a new life as a singer but a series of robberies gets people wondering if he has returned to his old ways.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: A young rebel goes into legend after being reincarnated to save his people from their tyrannical emperor.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: From writer director Pan Lei comes this Chinese variation of Henry King's famous 1950's film about a persecuted swordsman.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Winner of Best Martial Arts Award at the 1978 Asian Film Festival, this piece is directed by Liu Chia-liang and features his brother, Gordon, as a martial arts master.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: As the aggressive Chin Empire conquers the Chao Kingdom and drains the Wei empire, adventure, intrigue and tragedy abound as the armies march into battle.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: A young couple lived happily in a house but the woman becomes haunted after she accidentally kills her husband.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: The story of the Shaolin Temple's betrayal by the White-Browed Hermit and Shaolin hothead Fong Sai-yuk's revenge bid gets retold again.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han Hsiang directs this fascinating comedy about three couples and forbidden love across Macau and Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: After a man's household pays dearly for his faith in his business rival, he turns to his swordmate and that man's son for help.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: Lo Lieh finds himself involved in romance, court intrigue and deadly jousts while trying to protect a baby who is the Emperor's secret heir apparent.

programme.title: Heroes of Sung
programme.desc: In this period action film, Meng Hung (Shih Szu) must work with Fan Tien-Fu (Lo Lieh) to protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Be tickled by the slippery efforts of three pickpockets, so adept at their chosen skill that they even manage to fleece three beauties of their underwear!

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Director Ching Siu-tung won international acclaim for this tale of an underachiever who is assigned to unlock the secret of the gibbon fists tactic.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: Director Chor Yuan teams with star Ti Lung and famed novelist Chu Yu in the creation of this intriguing kung fu saga.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This comedy contains dramatisations of some of the funniest and most surreal film gossips of director Li Han-Hsiang's 30 year career.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Martial arts maestro Lo Wei wrote, directed and co-starred in this tale of greed and lust for financial gain that depicts a family brought to its knees.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Hsuan sets out to apprehend George Eaton, a high profile thug who has escaped to Hong Kong. With home support, can Yang take him down?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: This Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical depicts a turbulent romance between Yu Lan, a passionate tea picker and a charming fisherman named Chun Yang.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: In this award-winning Chang Cheh film, David Chiang plays a psychotic who stops at nothing to avenge his elder brother's death.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Directed by Chow Sze Loke and Li Han Hsiang, this classic starring Diana Chang, Chang Chung and Pai Yun depicts how Lotus Pan marries a midget, yet has an affair.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: A young innocent girl is betrayed by her loved ones & decides to take control of her life by becoming a gangster. Starring China's famed actors, Raquel Xu & Emotion Cheung.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: Directed by Dante Lam and starring Zhang Yi, Huang Jing Yu & Du Jiang, this military saga depicts a Chinese naval commando unit that intercepts terrorists to save Chinese citizens in Yemen.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: An inept kidnapper has the table turned on him by the wily businessman he kidnaps, and is coerced into doing his bidding. How will the story end for the captor and the captive?

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: I'm Livin' it
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint with a group of homeless people, with a plan to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Old Cow vs Tender Grass
programme.desc: At 49, Singaporean taxi driver Moo is still trying to find love. His life seems set to change when he meets the young, but eccentric Moon, an avid animal lover. Are they meant to be?

programme.title: Call of Heroes
programme.desc: Sean Lau, Louise Koo & Eddie Peng star in this action-packed story of a group of villagers who stand up to a cruel young warlord to protect their home.

programme.title: Love Contractually
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sammi Cheng plays a beautiful CEO who decides to "borrow" sperm from a man to have her own child. This is also her first collaboration with Joseph Cheng.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Tasked to protect the community from monsters, a mystic monk has to seek divine intervention when the Emperor abruptly dies, and dark forces threaten the world!

programme.title: Kidnap Ding Ding Don
programme.desc: 2015 HKFA Best Supporting Actress & Best New Performer Ivana Wong pairs up with Alex Fong, who plays an amnesiac kidnapper falling for his hostage.

programme.title: Foolish Plan
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: Starring Zhou Dong Yu & Joseph Chang, this comedy depicts a young man falling in love with a girl who only eats nail clippers!

programme.title: Extraordinary Mission
programme.desc: An undercover cop attempts to take down a drug trafficking syndicate from the inside. However, his operation spirals out of control when he becomes an addict while trying to gain the leader's trust.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: This wildly popular Korean comedy stars Kim Ah Jung & Ju Jin Mo in the story of a talented but overweight girl, who undergoes extensive plastic surgery to become a slender bombshell.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman
programme.desc: There's no love lost between a plump manager & a charming lady but find themselves swapping bodies after getting struck by lightning.

programme.title: 10,000 Miles
programme.desc: In his first movie as a producer, Jay Chou went the distance for his multi-billion ultramarathon film by bringing in a top-notch VFX team from Hollywood.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: This drama depicts a heartbreaker who has countless female partners. However, when he unexpectedly develops feelings for the first time, an intriguing love story begins.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk, Dragon Return
programme.desc: Ji Gong forms an alliance with people from all walks of life to save humanity. Battle-hardened General Gao dare not marry his childhood sweetheart and turns to Ji Gong for help but things go awry.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars a railroad worker who leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to help the poor. Tao, Wang Kai & Darren Wang co-star in this action-comedy film.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Stephy Tang plays the half-Chinese, half-Japanese daughter of a karate master, who discovers upon her father's death that she must share ownership of his prized dojo with a disgraced former pupil.

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: A winner of Hong Kong Film Awards, Paradox stars Louis Koo as a police inspector who takes on a vicious Thai syndicate in search of his lost daughter.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships.

programme.desc: The buggy is nearly finished. It's back from paint, and all that remains is wiring, plumbing, body panel installation and the interior.

programme.desc: Flames are flying as fireworks explode and a fire department training exercise goes wrong. Also, A drone hits a groom in the face.

programme.desc: Saksikan kisah Mariam sanggup memalsukan dokumen tanah harta arwah suaminya.

programme.title: Promo / PSA Covid-19
programme.desc: Sentiasa ingatkan diri kita supaya kekal berada di rumah, patuh dengan SOP dan jaga kawalan kendiri. Melawan COVID-19 adalah tanggungjawab kita bersama!

programme.title: Jom Redah
programme.desc: Qaiesya Islyn ke Kelantan dan menyaksikan keunikan beberapa lokasi menarik antaranya Kopitiam Kita, Pasar Siti Khadijah, Gelanggang Seni, Alemy Meggi Ketam Semerak dan juga Wakaf Che Yeh.

programme.title: Promo / PSA Covid-19
programme.desc: Sentiasa ingatkan diri kita supaya kekal berada di rumah, patuh dengan SOP dan jaga kawalan kendiri. Melawan COVID-19 adalah tanggungjawab kita bersama!

programme.title: Sihat Cantik Dan Menawan
programme.desc: Perkongsian cara-cara melakukan senaman ringan bersama Wan Suhaila dan perkongsian resipi makanan kesihatan iaitu pastry cincin berinti telur dan bayam bersama Chef Esa.

programme.title: Rona Sabah
programme.desc: Ikuti kisah Chi On dan Denver yang hilang punca pendapatan akibat daripada pandemik Covid-19, mula menyara keluarganya dengan memancing udang galah di sekitar Sungai Kota Klias.

programme.title: Awas!

programme.title: Ganjil Yang Indah

programme.title: Kembara Damai
programme.desc: Tempat-tempat menarik di sekitar Bangkok, Thailand antaranya Stesen Hua Lamphong, Stesen Ayutthaya, Wat Rachaburana, Wat Mahathat, Ayutthaya Elephant Palace dan Masjid Jamiul Islam bersama Maulana.

programme.desc: BoBoiBoy, Ying, Yaya, Gopal dan Fang berperangai pelik disebabkan 'Pistol Emosi Y'. Mereka bersama Ochobot menuju ke Markas Adu Du untuk mencari penawar. Mereka harus melepasi beberapa halangan.

programme.title: Kamen Rider Zero One
programme.desc: Seorang pelawak muda, Aruto Hiden, mendapati dirinya mewarisi syarikat teknologi mendiang datuknya serta Zero-One Driver untuk menjadi Kamen Rider Zero-One seorang adiwira yang melindungi manusia sejagat

programme.title: Halaqah
programme.desc: Ikuti diskusi yang padat dengan informasi oleh ilmuan Dato Dr Zainal Abidin, siarawan Hj Ahmad Noor Sulaiman akan mengupas mengenai topik RUMAH KOSONG berdasarkan sains, fakta, Al-Quran, Sunnah dan Hadis.

programme.title: Mr. Bibik
programme.desc: Pertunangan diantara Aulia dan Mukhriz sudah terjalin hampir 2 tahun namun Alia masih tidak dapat menerima Mukhriz sebagai tunangnya. Bagi Aulia pertunangan diantara dia Mukhriz langsung tidak diterimanya.

programme.title: Buletin Utama

programme.title: Kekasih Hati Mr. Bodyguard

programme.title: Sidang JKK

programme.title: Gerak Khas : Undercover
programme.desc: Malik bengang dengan Zaki sebab tidak memberitahu dia tentang rancangan Rosyam, namun Zaki beritahu yang dia hanya mengikut arahan. Malik arahkan Zaki untuk jaga kelab dan memastikan semua operasi lancar.

programme.title: Sophia Diari Seorang Traveller

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Man in Love
programme.desc: Tae-Il lives a fast life as low level thug. When he learns that he has a terminal illness without much time left to live, he falls in love for the first time.

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: The Big Swindle
programme.desc: Four con artists band together to perform a complex heist against the Bank of Korea, against the police, and against each other.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Chronicle of a Blood Merchant
programme.desc: Set in the 1960's after the Korean War, a couple is happily married for 11 years until a rumor spreads around the village that the man isn't the real father of their eldest son......

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: in Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman's three grown children one after the other - Eldest son Han-mo, second son In-mo, and double divorce daughter Mi-yun.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: Underground Rendezvous
programme.desc: A series of disasters in the big city bring an aspiring teacher to a small town where he falls in love with a girl whose origins are mysterious.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Sisters
programme.desc: After spending time in a mental institution, two sisters return home to reunited with their family and inexplicable events start to occur...

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Right before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: The City of Violence
programme.desc: When a detective returns to his hometown for an old friend's funeral, he gets mixed in with the local gangsters and teams up with his old friends to avenge his death.

programme.title: Bank Attack
programme.desc: Desperate for money to save his sick daughters life, a father decides to rob a bank. Things become much more complicated, when real bank robbers enter the bank.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: the Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Guimoon: the Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped...

programme.title: Memoir of a Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins 'equally worse' fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Hotel Del Luna Ep09
programme.desc: Man-wol is an immortal and the CEO of Hotel Del Luna, a place for dead spirits to rest. She meets elite hotelier Chan-sung and starts to recall her sin that she committed 1000 years ago.

programme.desc: Man-wol is an immortal and the CEO of Hotel Del Luna, a place for dead spirits to rest. She meets elite hotelier Chan-sung and starts to recall her sin that she committed 1000 years ago.
